thread.title: Great location and hotel for ExCel
thread.title_full: Great location and hotel for ExCel - Review of Holiday Inn Express London - ExCeL, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Crown186220
title: Great location and hotel for ExCel
text:
My visit to the Holiday Inn Express was perfect for my attendance at a conference at ExCel. The room was a good size, clean with a modern bathroom and just a few minutes' walk from the DLR stop.
Jane and Paula in the bar and restaurant area were friendly and helpful providing service with a smile. Food was good although choice was limited. Miles better than my experience last year with a competitor and I would stay here again.
